attributes.action: Should parliament give the country an in or out referendum on membership of the EU before the next election.
attributes.additional_details:
I want politicians of all parties to show they are listening to the public and respect our views instead of riding rough shod over public opinion.  It is my belief that the majority of politicians only fight to remain in or gain power.

The dissolution with the politicians is that they will not fight for what we want only what their respective parties want.  The whole politic class are self promoting we get 5.6 weeks holiday per annum they along with others in what was the public service award themselves about 13 weeks.

Public sector working or office doesn't make you better than the rest of us. We are not your serfs and we are not plebs.

Give us back our country.

Give us a referendum now.
